Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Eric Anthony
Dear Sir,
Eric Anthony shouldn't play at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .208 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Jesse Garcia
Dear Sir,
Jesse Garcia has an AVG of .123 at AA Jackson Mets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
